CustomField.description: The maximum number of events a device can send in a period of time (set in Events period field), when log level field is set to Debug, Info, or Log.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The maximum number of events a device can send in a period of time (set in Events Period field) when Log Level field is set to: Debug, Info or Log. Recommended value 5000.
CustomField.label: Max Other Events
